message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $140 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $130 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. To ensure we reach an agreement that respects both our interests, I would like to counteroffer at $135 for the product.
I see, Alice. Let me think about this for a moment. I am willing to consider $132 for the product.

Thank you for considering my previous offers, Bob. After careful consideration, I would like to counteroffer at $133 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while also accommodating your budget.
After thinking it through, I am comfortable with $131 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our negotiations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In light of our discussion, I am prepared to offer the product at $132. This price strikes a balance between respecting the value of the product and your budget.
